message: Yea Pyramid, Pylons, Turbogears all let you do that. But Pyramid is the least coupled.
I don't believe any have special support for NoSQL so they're all about equal unless you want to include GAE or django-norel
@ericmoritz Some 'do' have special support, but the real question to ask is what web frameworks make it stupidly difficult to use NoSQL. >.<
Does anyone know a good Cassandra framework connector for python?
http://docs.pylonsproject.org/projects/pyramid_cookbook/dev/mongo.html is how it works in pyramid.. no "special" support, just a way to get at the underlying connection
I just came across this a minute ago, http://wiredset.com/2011/03/23/introducing-whirlwind-the-realtime-web-framework/
